Detailed Description

The Headers class provides methods to work with both request and response headers. Extended by Request and Response classes, which add specific functionality.
Author:
Bas van Gaalen
Since:
1.0

Headers.getHeaders ( $  bAsString = false  ) 

Get all headers as either array or string, depending on input (defaults to array).

Parameters:
